Blog.post: ___sAdNeSs sToRy__y haf ya broken my heart again??and again??i dun understand y...nvm since u cant change wad u haf promised i will try n accept the fact tad u will nvr ever change even if i ask u too...even if i accept my heart will hurt alot bt u nvr reali understand the pain i m going through the sadness which fills my heart...every now n den i feel hapi able being wif u bt sumtimes.....u came in after....the smell will nvr lie to mi tt u haf taken it oni to quietly tink hate tad ******* thou being my fren bt influence him alot i dunno since pri sch he liddat or when in sec sch...if in sec how i wish i cld change him immediately during sec1...pri sch i wunt noe wad *** ex feel whenever tis hapens...my results drop as 1 of its reason nvr listen to lessons at times nvr do hw wadever cher say is correct...she knows the reason y my results drop bt kept it as a secret frm my mami the influence of u i tend to realise myself tt i play alot nowadays...i haf tried, tried reali hard to study for my test again put in all my effort bt still failed i dunno wad is the reason...i studied so hard put in all my effort bt in the end...whenever ppl ask mi qns abt u...i dunno how to ans dem...mayb the truth is i nvr ever understand u well b4...

in klass whole day i sadx2 wan lor tinking abt yesterdae tingy...i dunno wad caused him 2 tink tad he is useless n being luk down by everyone..when i hear it my heart went back 2 sad again...i dunno y reali feel lyk asking him bt i noe it hurts when tinking abt tings tt hurts alot...so i didnt bother...i tried tu msg him bt i dunnoe y he didnt recieve my 7 msgs mayb he fell aslp rady or mayb he didnt even recieve it all at...*taking a deep breath* it may b god making fun of mi...no offences bt it is true y he didnt recieve it...chinese lesson dere riting letter toking abt tis bt after sch didnt manage to gif it 2 him...nvm cant tell him i will say it here...if u wan tu make ur parents hapi n nt wori abt u...u surely can if u can xia ding jue xin tu concentrate on ur studies n nt 2 take animor sweets coz when ever i happen 2 noe tt u eat sweets again my heart juz totally break u broke ur promise 2 ur mami n mi...nvr tu smoke again i hope it is true n juz wan tt carrian n others dun offer him cigarattes animor omg!! i hope i can pei u mor time 2gether bt nt 2 play is study 4 the cuming exams i reali veri veri wori abt ur results seeing all ur test n exams results...haiz...i dunno hw 2 say...oni wish tad u can reali put in the effort to study dun spent so much tm online playing games or on msn...wad 2 say tt is my heart reali veri PAIN!!! stay out of trouble c u everytm go stand outside haiz bt dunno wad happen tad cause it lyk 2day every1 came asking mi y?? wad happen oni 2 say i dunno...mayb ur new specs ba...melissa n mi tinking...melissa tell mi u miz mi alot bt i oso miz u mor den a 1000 times of urs thou wi c each other everydae in sch even in same klass bt we nvr even tok much i dunno y is tis happening...nvr ever make a promise when u noe u cant promise it...coz my heart nw is broken...oni in klass 2 cry quietly at 1 corner without letting ani1 noe eyes red tears drop...mayb pain is the oni word can express my feelings...

haiyoyo...today arh erm...quite a hapi day compared 2 other days...haha...real farni lor tu mi...stupid wei song lar tok n tok no stop wan arh...so luo sou sia...fight here n dere...haha...jasmin dun understand the maths ch 15 down dere ask n ask wad is tis wad is tad aiyo...make mi weisong boon ping chuan jie dere so bek ceh sia luff n luff no stop mi n weisong teach here rady still down dere HUH?? haiz...cher teach again ans ossHUH?? mi n WS c each other den luff till go siao liao arh...tupid cher oso say weisong my stead go n die lar he my stead i go die better arh...hehe...weisong n i shout "she/he den nt my stead arh!!!"...den weisong say nicole stead is bc...den cher suddenly say say until chuanjie oso my stead aiYo!!! cher crazy de...den say until ask mi "so how mani bf i haf gt WS CJ blah blah..."siao i nt flirt sia i oni luv my one n oni chunx2 wor...luv him lotz i nt so hua xin gt so mani stead lar...i nt two-timer or even 3-timer...hahaha...bt nvm he brought laughter tu mi muz say he pro nt every1 can do tad lo...keke...ltr cum hm go online haha...go login gb den dear online farni sia i dunno hw 2 play ask mi go team wif him n play against carrian n elson haha...den hai dear lose muhaha...hu call him ask mi team wif him coz i nvr even play at all oni sit dere chat...haha...all trying to teach mi hw 2 play n i kip saying huh?? coz is true mah dun even understand wad the hell dey toking wad left wad rite...i shoot oso dunno hw to shoot arh ask mi play...aiyoyo...ltr going play against xueqian n carrian...mayb oni coz i wan tu slp le leh now oni 10.49 sia ask mi wait till 11.00 haiz...dunno can tahan anot mayb i login le 5 sec den logout liao man... haha...nvm c how 1st nw continue tu do my art if nt ltr cannot finish...

2dAy nE dEaR n eLsoN cUm mI hSe lOr...dEn soTx2 de lor dey both dunno y oso lar juz tink dey both siao de lo cum my hse play gunbound oni...dey fighting hu play first...haha bt in the end is play my acc haha...siao de lar... so bad treat mi as maid sia ask mi tis gur piggy go cook humph nvm...stupid elson hao xin cook for him say i add poison in it...say nvr le mah dun believe nvm lor say i kip on luffing muz be gt gu guai...yi xin bing so zhong haiyoyo...no wonder candice arh...hahaha....nth nvm...scary oso dear go liao half an hour ltr his mother call mi sia "nicole arh ni dong bc zai na li ma"the1st sentence is alws sure tis wan...den is "ta qu na li le?gen shui zai yi qi?" bt den my ans is alws dunno...haha...pro hor bt i reli dunno mah...nvm i headche ever since dey left now is 10.00pm sharp i wan go orh orh liao lor...tml tad tingy tml den go tink n say...tc dear god bless him...*hUggiEz*

i hAf tHoUgHt yOu hAvE giVeN uP oN sMoKiNg tHe idEa yOu cAmE bAcK lEttiNg mElIsSa sMeLliNg uR hAnd tAd iS sTaiN wIf dA sMeLl mY hEaRt hUrTz ritE aT tT mOmEnT oNi tU cRy dEePly iN mY hEaRt wEnT bAcK hOmE mYsElf 2dAy sLoWly tiNkiNg abT tIs...i dUnNo wHeThEr tU bEliEvE yOu aNymOr jUz fEeL lYk tElLiNg U tHe rEaSoN y i cAnT gO oUt oFtEn wIf yOu aNymOr...iS bEcOz mY mAmI rAdY noE tAd yOu aNd tHe rEsT aRe eAtiNg"sWeEts" aNd sUm hOw i aM rUnNiNg aWaY fRoM tIs rEaliTy wHicH iS y i aVoIdiNg yOu, nT gOiNg oUt wIf yOu...mY hEaRt iS tOtAlLy cOnfUsEd dEeP iN mY hEaRt i aSk mYsElf dO i sTiLl rEaLi lUv yOu bT i cAnT fiNd tHe aNs nOw bT i fEeL tAd i sTiLl cArE fOr yOu hOw yOu fEeLiNg??wHaT aRe U tiNkiNg iN uR miNd??...toTaLly cOnfUsEd i fEeL tAd U aRe mUcH mOr cLoSeR wIf aNniE dEy aLl dEn mI...i aLwAyZ bEeN woNdEriNg y tHe pAsT fEw mThs...aNniE noE mUcH mOr tiNgs dEn i dO whEn i m sUpPosE tU iNsTeAd...iS iT mY wRoNg oR uRs dErE'z oNi 1 tiNg iN mY miNd nOw do i sTiLl lUv dO aS mUcH aS i dO iN tHe pAsT....i dUnNo...i M nO loNgEr tAd cOnfIdEnT bEtWeEn tHe rElAtiOnsHiP wIf yOu... "nVr eVeR pRoMisE mI whEn yOu kNoW tAd U aRe goiNg tU bReAk iT" "nVr hOld mY hAnd tIgHtly whEn yOu aRe gOiNg tU lEt iT go iNsTeAd" "nVr sAy yOu lUv mI whEn yOu arE nOt aNymOr fOr iT hUrTz mOr iN mY hEaRt..."

fEeL sicK sTiLl siNcE yEstErdAe nItE...fEvEr aNd hEadachE hAiZz...jEfFsToN cAlL tOk aNd tOk sO fArNi mAkE mI dUnNo hOw tU aNs hIs qNs cOz dAdDy iN fRoNt oF mI oNi...fRi cAnNoT cUm lOr mI mUm aT hM uNlEsS wAn tU sEe hEr fAcE dEN cUm lOr bT i dUn wAn tiNk fRi i gO jiEjIe hSe bA sOo bOrEd... dUnNo lAr sEe hOw fiRsT...bT dEn sIcK lEh sTiLl hAvE tU gO tO sCh 2dAy fOr tHe dUnNo wAd rAcIaL hArmOnY cOmpEtitioN dReSsiNg...gO oN sTagE sO mAlU siA...siT iN tHe hAlL gO bAcK kLaSs cAnT tAhAn aNymOr cRy oUt fEeL lYk vOmItiNg aT dA mOmEnT...whOlE bOdY lYk fLoAtiNg lIdDaT fEeL sO ligHt...no sTrEngTh...sCiEncE gO bAcK kLaSs tAkE sToRy bK sTuPid mAtThEw gO kiCk tHe bRoOm dEn kAnNa mY tOe tHe jOiNt dErE iMmEdIatEly cRy oUt pAiN lYk hElL aNd tT iDoiT mAtThEw hIt pPl oSo dUnNo hOw tU sAy sOriE wAn sTiLl sTand dErE aNd lUf wiF hAn sIoNg whOlE kLaSs dUn lYk dEm tHe mOsT eVerYtimE fIghT iN fRoNt aT mY tAblE dErE i dUnNo kAnNa hOw mAni tImEz LiAo pLaY wiF pApEr bAlL oSo dUnNo kAnNa hIt hOw mANi tiMeZ...bT dEn gO hAlL siT bEsidE gU nIaNg...dOwN dErE sEe mI cRy dEn kIp sAyiNg jOkeZ cHeEr mI uP dEn fiNaLly i lUfF lE tHx tU hiM...nOw toE sTiLl bElLiE dE pAiN...hEad oSo bElLIe pAiN...dEn aFtEr sChOol wAlK hOmE wIf jiEjIe aNd sHeRmAiN sO fArNi lOr eAt iCe-cReAm dEn jiE sHiRt kAnNa hAhA...sHeRmAiN dAmN sCarY lO cRoSs tHe rOad dEn sUdDeNly lOsT bAlAncE aLmOsT fAlL sCaRe mI siA dEn sCrEaM oUt sOo loUd... hAiZz gO rEsT liAo...tAkE cArE lOr dEaR dEaR...mIz yOu loTz*mUaCkZ*

tImE pAsSeZ sOo fAsT 2dAy...oOh gOd rEaLi mIz hIm sOo mUcH 2dAy i dUn cArE jUz sAy tHe fEeLiNgZ fRoM dA bOtToM oF mY hEaRt...sOrIe dEaR rEaL sOriE iN sChOoL aLwAyZ nVr tOk 2 U iN kLaSs bEiNg sEpArTed fRoM 1 eNd tU aNoThEr mIz tHosE tImEz bEiNg wIf yOu alOt rEalI hOpE tU sPeNt mOr timE wIf u bT eVerYtImE u aLwAyZ hANg oUt wiF cArRiAn dEy aLl acTuAlI i dUn rEaLi lYk bUt hAiZz nVm u hAf uR oWn fReNz i hAb mY oWn sOo nVm bUt i hOpE u rEalI dEcidE tU gIf uP oN sMoKiNg fRoM tHe bOtToM oF uR hEaRt cOz iT rEaLi bReAk mY hEaRt whEn sEeiNg u bReAk tHe pRoMisE u mAdE tO mI aNd uR mAmI...a bAd iNflUeNcE bEiNg 2gEthEr wIf *ahEm* fEeL lYk tElLiNg u gUd bUdDyZ wIlL nVr eNcOuRagE u 2 dO tiNgZ tAd iS wRoNg bT sHoUld iNsTeAd hElp yOu iN qUitiNg...sm timE i fEeL lYk bReAkiNg wIf u bT i cAnT bRiNg mYsElf 2 dO iT cOz i fOuNd mYsElf lUviNg u alOt...wIsH tAd u cAn sPeNd mOr timE oN uR sTudIeZ wOrK hArd dUn tiNk oF pLaYiNg dUn mAkE uR mAmI oR mI wOrRy fOr yOu aNymOr...*tAkiNg a dEeP DeEp bReAtHE*

I wOndEr whY yOu dId dIs tO mI…I tReAt yOu aS mY bEsT fRiEnD aNd aLwAyZ tReAsUrE aLl tHe wOndErfUl tImE aNd mOmEnTs bEiNg wIf yOu…whEn I tOt oF tHosE sWeEt tImEz bEiNg tOgEthEr aFtEr sChOoL tEaRs rOlLs dOwN, hEaRt hUrT lOtZ…I wOnDeR iF yOu wOuLd fEeL tHe sAmE…I jUz wAn tO lEt yOu nOe tAd nO mAtTeR wAd yOu hAf dOnE oR sAiD tO mI I wIlL cHeRisH tIs fRiEndShIp TiLl tHe eNd oF mY lIfE… mY hEaRt hUrT whEneVeR I tOt oF yOu cOz I rEaLi cArE fOr yOu I wIlL bE dErE fOr yOu whEn yOu nEeD mI… A fRiEnD iS tHe pErsOn wIf whOm yOu cAn bE uRsElF…a pErsOn whOm yOu cHeRiSh aNd wItH whOm yOu dUn vE tO pREtEnD…a fRiEnD iS tHe eAr tAd lIstEns oUt fOr yOu aND sTaNdS bY yOu wAdeVeR yOu gO tHrOuGh…aNd i wIlL bE oNe oF dEm hU wIlL aLwAyZ bE dErE whEn U nEed mI...

hao xiang nian ni wor...darx2 miz u soo much...nvr c u 4 2 days oni rady miz u lyk hell le cant imagine life without u is how...haiz...reali hope ni hui ming bai wo...bu shi wo bu ken qu liao jie ni...er shi dang ni you shi qing de shi hou ni que bu gao su wo...wo xi wang neng he ni yi qi fen xiang ni de kuai le he fan nao...2dae u say sick le hope u r ok now...god bless him wor faster okok...u nt in class 2day veri sian leh...miz u soo much u nt here 2day haiz..my gastric cum back again...pain lyk hell sia going to faint le...lucky eleanor gt gastric pill bt i dunno how to swallow so much chew n chew...so bitter...drank almost half of rachel's water...tongue numb numb de...eeEk liyana c rady oso dere lyk feel the bitterness liddat...haha so farni...now stomach still very pain cant walk...go home tt time lyk fainting liddat along the way dunno rest how mani times took mi 30mins to reach home...malu malu...reali very de malu...cher return sci class test den u absent mah...cher ask hu ur bestfren...wa lao every1 start to cough n cough den luk n mi bt im the end cher still ask yongwei to take 4 u...i cant do anyting lor ltr ms ng oso noe den die die le...*bending down* stomach pain sia...HELP!!!in the morning zuoyang pass mi plastic bag inside gt smt...den i shock lor...ms sajnani saw le den ask "zuoyang is tt for nicole?"..."ltr boon chun jealous leh.." wah...whole class start to make tt farni farni noise...idoit lar i dere xia bu liao tai arh...dear dear juz wan u to noe tt wo hui yi zhi zai ni shen bian de...wu lun shen me shi qing xiang xing wo shi bu hui diu xia ni yi ge ren qu cheng dan de...zhen de xi wang neng zai qi di kan dao ni zhen zheng de siao...zhe shi wo xin zhong de yi ge xin yuan...wo ai ni...mUacKx

if i nvr wan 2 go 2 the toliet, everting wldnt haf happen at all...bt wad cld i do leh...fate ba haiz...whole story is liddat lor... went toliet den mr san dere den sway kanna stop by him ask where ur pass...tt ting on ur hand is wad took it off den he start nagging..."nicolex2 ur name has been mention by alot of ppl"...den wad"u better watch out" idoit mrs chua...use 2 lyk her bt now hate her 2 the core she point at my socks say"dere" ask mi take off my shoes n of coz cant escape he ask mi buy socks...den i say i nvr bring money "i dun care go back class n take money"..."RUN!!!" asshole lor so i run without wearing my shoe properly... damn tired sia so i hack care walk slowly back 2 class take my wallet den tell mrs teo "cher i kanna caught by mr san nid 2 buy socks"...den i went off le...met ericko den i still gt time 2 sit on the stairs den i tok 2 him awhile den i shun pian rest lor..den dicided 2 pull up my socks...go down c him"i didnt ask u pull ur socks i said buy..."...turn around n walk 2 the bkshop lor idoit so mani ppl dere he go shout at mi"RUN!!"...tink tt his commonly used words arh...run half way i stop den walk aniwae he so far le...i dun care slowly go buy socks...wear it...go c him start 2 nag again "my 4god-son have been mentioning ur name""better watch out"..."was shock when i heard ur name mention"...better dun mix wif them"..."no point mixing wif bad ppl"...wadever..."i m going 2 check on u"..."is the peron u anot"..."go back to class"...walk slowlyback to class panting lyk hell...sweating lyk mad...n damn malu went back klass every1 luk at mi nvm... i sit down rest den cher ask mi ok anot...i say ok thx lor den samrit n huilin ask wad happen tell dem... den rest le den i go change back my socks throw the new one aside...waste my $1.00 on this ugly long thick socks...after history i cry again...no mood at tt moment chinese period i oso cry...i bad mood le stupid miss lee again ask mi follow her during recess take tings for her...tink wad i her maid ar i so angry still call mi take nvm i muz tahan nt her fault she dunno aniting... cry until recess le den stop...after sci went back klass act nth happen back 2 my hapi land again...now crying again...drawing all sorts of drawing to vent my anger on mr san...even pretend to draw his pic on the paper n draw lyk hell...1 sentence to describe my feeling 2wards him"I HATE HIM!!!"... now tinking want to change sch back 2 st.nicks...if i nvr went 2 tis sch nth will happen i m still a gur no stress no scoldings lyk tis wan...dun haf to meet those ppl i hate bt haf to act as fren dem...reali tinking to change bt if i leave tis sch i may nt haf the chance to meet dear le...bt i still a bit angry wif him...haiz nvm tml half day...still going out wif gladys...take NEOPRINTS!! dun wish 2 tink abt sad tings tml muz be hapix2 de...

haiz...feel lyk....wif him lor dunno y 2day the feelingbery guai guai de...feel tt we r nt in tt situation le lor luv can alws be so heartless...it is alws so painful...dun understand y...hack care... ltr muz rmb go ask mami go out on fri after sch wif glad...dun tink can lo nvm try try first...idoit lor...tupid miss SAJNANI...stare wad stare lar go dig ur eyeballs out arh...i dun sing leh see wad u can do...hate her lor...her attitude tink sucks mor den mi sia...everydae scold scold us oni...no wonder lar break off with her "future husband" of coz lar hu can stand her attitude n character...if i was her bf i rady break off with her immediately... stay in sch 2dae bellie late den go hm...talk 2gether wif michelle dey all farni sia the ericko... wah!!cca...a painful experience man slide her n dere knee xi bei pain...injured myself dunno how mani times le...another idoitic cher again miss LEE say i dance no strength go n die lar go try dancing n c how tired it is 2 do the same ting over n over again sum mor is a painful ting...tok 2 her i hack care lor i go ding zhui back...haha...loss 4 words...now everydae wear pink colour...in luv arh...hu will wan tis lau gu nu...shirt skirt shoe sum mor...all pink...thou i lyk pink lar bt my god is damn disgusting lor...whole body pink...asshole sum mor go pull my shirt out i gin her den she say"bu yao yong zhe zhong yan shen can zhe wo..." if nt pei gladys go staff rm i walk away liao still see her "lian se"... wadever lor 2day i no mood lor veri angry...

morining raining sia nid go hall sway sia sit beside weisong...den kip on making mi luff n laf no stop lyk siao den so bad say the sandeep a elephant taking pledge...say wad i haf seen a pig dancing,now is time to see a elephant take pledge...i dere wa! cant tahan sia luff lyk siao...is he make mi laf de lor den say i sot de everytime laf n laf... aiyo...nvm den rmb gt the spot check ting wa sia la scared till lyk siao sia ask the weisong dun tok le i bellie scared he say scared wad aiyo...den he mor siao lor say "aiyo dun cry arh u c u wan 2 cry le" sot de arh he...bt all the luffing make mi 4get the ting den dismiss le weisong say bye den i say bie lor den start 2 scared again...wah bt aiya nth lar...after eng period cher return all the bks...*phew* 2day gt gastric during lesson tym aiyo! sway sia lucky mrs ang haven cum so can squat for awhile pain lyk hell sia...wan 2 stand up cannot stand up den i juz stood dere...n tt sabrina! arh go call him aiyo... liddat oso call...wan 2 catch her skirt b4 she go over bt hand dunno y aiming nt zhun... den every1 cum gib mi food ask mi eat...sum mor take frm the hamper de...bt i juz dun wan 2 eat lar...every1 ask u ok anot..haiz...bt nvm thx for all ya concern lo den dear oso dere squat wif mi...aiyo...wan 2 fu mi sit on the chair den i juz cant stand up den squat down again b4 reaching the chair...haiz den mrs ang cum le...haiz nid 2 get back 2 the chair and sit wah!!!cannot stand still n greet her sia pain lyk hell...whole lesson dere tahan the pain den reading period muz better le... assembly dunno watch wad malay tingy ar dere slping liao n wantu go toliet sia coz juz now gastric dun wan eat so juz drink water lor...wah...full lyk siao man...tot dismiss le can go toliet wa lao! nid 2 take class photo..den cannot go...sway sia...haiz...tis tym i is sit down de leh...bt den take photo tt time i nvr smile lor...so dunno how is the result...yeah!!take finish le lor BT i dun wan go toliet le...hahahaha... den go back class wrap the hamper lor...sian sia 1 person in class till liyana cum den dey open tis open tt...den met 2 sot char bo i dunno hu r dey...juz walk intu the class n help mi pack...den gt fencing training mah the xue qian running ask mi gif him smt... aiyo down dere so wei nan...still gt the cliff ar...wah 2 so noisy sia say faster faster...den take liao leh gif mi back again...sot wan arh dey all N remind mi of weixiong dunno steal how mani tings le his npcc fren oso aiyo our class is wad minimart ar...ltr lian jie carrian n chun cum uo 2 class again guess wad...to take the food again... den i gif him cake le still nt enough summor cum into class n take summor ting esp tt lian jie dunno take wad ting i dun care i take my bag n go home le haha...say biebye nobody ans oni rachel lor den i juz go le lor...den die 4get take maths tb...haiz walk back again n take den saw melissa taking my umbrella...oh ya...!!den i rmb i still 4get take...hehe...k lar tink i stop here been typing 4 the past half an hour le...

oH god...wad m i going 2 do how 2 face the whole class tml??!!? i am so confused...feel so bad, gulity oH!! fine! is my fault lar dunno hu the hack toopid person say gt spot check den all running back 2 class collect all their bks...we hao xin collect bt in the end no spot check at all bt our whole class the books reali kanna confiscated coz of our foolishness...i dun mean it 2 happen bt...nvm dun wish 2 repeat the whole story again friday i was juz so sad tt i cried no stop...went back 2 class n continue crying cheryl was dere to consol us thx lot bt juz cant stop at the moment when i was cryinng i wanted 2 find dear dear bt i cant... even dear came back 2 class n took tings--mean the food in the class i couldnt control bt tears juz kip cuming out...i had no choice bt juz 2 cry out i tried 2 hide n act lyk i wasnt crying at all n sucessfully he managed nt 2 see mi cry...want 2 hide nt coz dun wanna noe wad i did juz dun wan him 2 worry coz he haf 2 sit outside office le...nvm he said bye n smile 2 mi oni ting 2 do is mian qiang smile back the him and wave biebye...oh god can tell u the feeling is damn terrible to control...my heart reali hurts alot alot... mami came 2 sch n find mi i told i was in sch...she asked for wad told her i was crying she was wori came 2 sch n see mi n sia sway ms tina came...dey both tok n tok...i juz took it as er bian feng...i hack care at the moment nth else cld get inside my head oni the spot check ting...bt instead of an wei mi when i was crying she scolded mi...HATE HER!!!
